caption.center: HENRY MAYERSOHN, Respondent, v. MILTON DIAMOND, Appellant.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Order unanimously modified by denying the motion to strike out the denial of that part of paragraph "Fifth" of the amended complaint beginning with the words "and as a result of said collision" and continuing to the end of said paragraph; and as so modified affirmed, without costs, with leave to the defendant to serve a further amended answer within five days after service of order with notice of entry thereof. No opinion.
opinion.panel: Present â€” Martin, P.J., Townley, Glennon, Untermyer and Dore, JJ.
